org.jclouds.aws.ec2.features

Interface AWSInstanceApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AWSInstanceClient, InstanceApi, InstanceClient

    public interface AWSInstanceApi
extends AWSInstanceClient, InstanceApi
    Provides access to Instance Services.

    Note that this class is transitionary and will fully replace its parent in 1.7.

    Author:
    Adrian Cole
